cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB_ID to an invalid hexadecimal string 'invalid_hex' will cause parsing errors during configuration loading and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PDSCH antenna ports XP to a negative value -1 will cause validation errors in the physical layer configuration and prevent the DU from starting.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PDSCH 天線端口 XP 設定為負值 -1 會在物理層配置中導致驗證錯誤，並阻止 DU 啟動。
